content.rendered:
Sugar cane juice packed in plastic bottle and frozen. Each bottle is attached a plastic straw, it is very convenient for users, frozen sugar cane juice has a shelf life of up to 2 years when stored at a temperature of minus 18 degrees Celsius.

The process of Frozen Sugarcane Juice

The sugar cane is washed, peeled and washed before being pressed for water

Sugarcane juice is packed in bottle and frozen at a negative temperature of 40-35 degrees C

excerpt.rendered: Sugar cane juice packed in plastic bottle and frozen. Each bottle is attached a plastic straw, it is very convenient…
